details.name: Funskool Upwords
details.description:
Fun-Filled Vocabulary Game for Kids
With the Funskool Upwords you can improve your kid's vocabulary in a fun-filled manner. The game requires you to stack letters upwards as well as sideways to build more and more meaningful words. While playing with this Funskool Upwords game, children will also learn to spell words correctly. Moreover, it will also help in developing their thinking abilities as well. At the end of this game, the person who has spelt maximum number of words correctly will get the highest score and become the winner. Boys as well as girls will enjoy playing this game equally.
Aids in the Mental Development of Children
Being extremely compact, you can comfortably carry this stacking word game even when you are travelling so that the kids can enjoy themselves during the journey. Apart from children, even adults will enjoy playing this game and testing their vocabulary. As the game encourages children to build words, it also helps in improving their hand-eye coordination because they have to think about the word and identify the correct letters to make it. The racks, letter tiles, label sheet and game board included in this game for 8 year old are made from superior quality material to ensure they last for long.

details.name: Benetton Inferno Paradiso Blue Eau de Toilette - 100 ml (For Men)
details.description: Benetton Inferno Paradiso Blue Eau de Toilette - 100 ml (For Men) Price: Rs.1190 For him, predictability is a bane and lack of change is equal to being stuck in a rut. The morning ideally starts with a bungee jump off the cliff and his day ends with scaling the heights of the local peak. His idea of a perfect date is one spent admiring coral in the deep sea and the typical flowers and chocolate routine makes him cringe. Benetton tries to encapture his wild stallion spirit in this luxury Eau de Toilette. Inferno Paradiso is his definition, his identity, his signature. The citrusy lemon finds an perfect partner in slightly peppery geranium in the opening notes of Inferno Paradiso Blue from Benetton as the nutty heart notes with cyclamen, jasmine and nutmeg cower in the strong flavors of vetiver, sandalwood, musk and cedarwood which add a certain depth and texture to the fragrance. A rounded bottle that is a cool blue is reminiscent of the beach and its beautiful blue waters. The contrasts at war in the fragrance make for an explosive cocktail that takes him to a whole new level.

details.name: Hunger Games Box (Set of 3 Books)
details.description:
Hunger Games Box (Set of 3 Books) (Boxed Set) Price Rs.599 The Hunger Games Trilogy (Set Of 3 Books) tells the story of Katniss Evergreen in a world placed in the future. Summary Of The Book The Hunger Games Trilogy (Set Of 3 Books) consists of the three books The Hunger Games Catching Fire and Mockingjay.
The books are set in an uncertain future in the totalitarian regime of Panem created after the destruction of North America. The entire country is dominated by the rich state known as the Capitol. In the Capitol the people are rich and live lavish lives. In the rest of the districts however the conditions are deplorable and the people extremely poor. The Capitol arranges an annual event called The Hunger Games in which citizens from the rest of the 12 districts fight till their death in a dangerous arena which is televised to the entire country. The citizens are selected by lottery. The district that wins receive numerous rewards food and supplies for its people from the Capitol. The event serves as entertainment to the Capitol and is a method for them to assert their dominance. In the story Katniss Evergreen volunteers to participate in place of her sister when she is selected to participate by lottery. The trilogy follows her as she faces many dangers in the course of the games. Further along the trilogy the other districts rise in rebellion against the dictatorship of the Capitol and its leader President Snow. Katniss is a major part of the rebellion. The trilogy weaves its way through a number of conspiracies plans and twists.

details.name: Fastrack Basics Analog Watch - For Women (Black)
details.description: Fastrack Basics Analog Watch - For Women (Black) Price: Rs.1495 Key Features Oval DialBlack StrapStainless Steel Back CaseWater Resistant Hailing from arguably India’s most popular and youth inspired range of Fastrack fashion accessories comes this Basic series analog timepiece for women. Sticking to their trademark styling and design feel, this Fastrack Basics Analog Watch perfectly combines great looks with a significant level of durability and reliability, making it an ideal choice of gift for wrist wear for all your casual occasions and get-togethers.& Body and Design Flaunting an innovative and elegantly designed oval dial, this women’s analog watch from Fastrack Basics comes with a clear and dark coloured watch face. Since the dial does not feature any hour markers, the only elements on the watch face apart from the watch hands are the Fastrack logo at the 12 o’clock position and the brand name at the 9 o’clock position. These branding elements along with the three time indicating hands sport a bright metallic finish, which against the dial’s dark background makes for hassle-free time reading. Functions and Other Features The cleverly designed dial on this Fastrack Basics watch is surrounded by a bright metallic case, which apart from adding to its stunning looks, also provides a considerable amount of protection and impact resistance. With the oval dial meant to sit horizontally on your wrist, the upper left and the lower right portions of the dial’s case feature stylish metallic extensions, which help attach it to the watch’s very classy and dark leather strap. This leather strap helps keep the watch comfortable wrapped around your forearm, even for extended periods. The dial and its delicate working parts get a further degree of protection in the form of a mineral glass with a dark border print. This mineral glass combines with the dial’s stainless steel back case to give the watch a water-resistant capability of up to 30 m in depth, thereby giving you a highly aesthetic personal timepiece a significant level of durability. Perfectly combining elegance and practicality, this Fastrack Basics analog watch makes an ideal choice for any of your casual events and gatherings.

details.name: Britney Spears Fantasy Eau de Parfum - 100 ml (For Women)
details.description: Britney Spears Fantasy Eau de Parfum - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.2310 Fantasy from popstar Britney Spears is for the woman who cherishes her playful side. Rainbows never cease to amaze her and she loves listening to tales of the unicorn long after she grows up and leaves home. Even though she is endearingly innocent, her restrained sensuality simmers just below the surface. Hidden in this luxury Eau de Parfum are memories of a happy childhood reminiscent of warm, fluffy marshmallows and freshly baked chocolate chip cookies straight from the oven.& Created by famed perfumer James Krivda in 2005, Fantasy is all about the balance between sensuality and innocence. Opening with fruity accords of exotic kiwi, luscious red litchi and succulent golden quince, a note of dark temptation arrives in the heart with enticing white chocolate orchid and lascivious jasmine. The base notes of musk and orris root linger in your senses long after the music dies down to just a hum in the background. Britney Spears Fantasy is captured in a colorful, girly flacon that represents the fun love potion that the fragrance is. Cheer on the girl in you, embrace your sensuality and celebrate the delicious comfort of being wrapped in a fantasy.

details.name: Governance for Growth in India
details.description: Governance for Growth in India (Paperback) Price Rs.155 Governance for Growth in India authored by one of the most inspiring Presidents India ever saw &ndash Dr. A. P. J. Abdul Kalam is a thoughtful and timely book on how the current issues India is facing could be tackled with an honest and corruptfree governance. Summary of the Book Dr. A. P. J. Abdul Kalam is one of the few leaders of India who has inspired the citizens beyond expectations. His genuine concern towards the country&rsquos growth has been unwavering and focussed. This book brings out his neverending enlightening thoughts and ideas to make India a better country in every sphere of development. Although a world famous scientist by profession Kalam proved to be an eminent President an inspiring leader of a massive country like India. He sets out numerous visions for not only the political leaders but also to the citizens of the nation. Farsighted ideas penned by him in this book are also practical and feasible to be implemented. His eye for detail and the thorough knowledge of the harsh realities are so compelling and commanding. A must have for responsible citizens and his ardent admirers. About A. P. J. Abdul Kalam Avul Pakir Jainulabdeen Abdul Kalam is an Indian scientist and the 11th President of India from 2002 to 2007. Dr. Kalam has worked with esteemed institutions across India contributing to the Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) and the Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO). Popularly known as the Missle Man of India for his contributions towards ballistics and launch vehicle technology he was a principal part of the PokhranII nuclear tests in 1998. A graduate of Aerospace Engineering at the Madras Institute of Technology Chennai Dr. Kalam is currently a visiting professor at Indian Institute of Management Shillong Indian Institute of Management Ahmedabad and Indian Institute of Management Indore honorary fellow of Indian Institute of Science Bangalore Chancellor of the Indian Institute of Space Science and Technology Thiruvananthapuram a professor of Aerospace Engineering at Anna University JSS University Mysore and also frequents several universities and colleges across the country contributing his vast engineering and management knowledge base to the youth of India. he is also the author of several books. details.name: The Jungle Omnibus
details.description: The Jungle Omnibus (Paperback) Price Rs.252 The jungle comes alive in this wonderfully evocative collection of stories and poems from Indias bestloved storyteller.Maneating panthers stealthy leopards majestic tigers and strange birds inhabit the pages of this delightful collection that brings together thrilling tales from the jungle. From the leopard who develops an unlikely bond with a human to a young boy who discovers a shelf of books in an old forest bungalow from Timothy the tiger cub that Grandfather brings home to tame to the maneater that terrorizes an entire villagehere is a world where man and wild beast come together in surprising fascinating ways.Interesting FactsTold in simple lyrical prose that characterizes Bonds writing The Jungle Omnibus brings together in one delightful volume a selection of stories and poems from the jungle spanning across the sixty years of Ruskin Bonds writing career.This volume effectively captures a world where man and beast come together in order to survive thus raising relevant questions about the environment and the need to protect the forest and its many inhabitants.In turns thrilling thoughtful funny and heartwarming this is a collection that will delight both children and adults alike. details.name: Casio Sheen Analog Watch - For Women (White)
details.description: Casio Sheen Analog Watch - For Women (White) Price: Rs.7595 Key Features Round DialWhite StrapStainless Steel Case, Stainless Steel BezelWater ResistantPush Button Clasp The Sheen series of Casio caters to an audience who is looking for an exemplary timepiece that can combine unrivalled functionality with incredibly sophisticated looks. Most watches today either have one or the other, often prioritising form over function. This here is the analog watch for women from Casio and it is just one such product from the brand that effortlessly manages to give you an incredibly good-looking timepiece along with the highest levels of practicality. Powered by a battery and kept ticking in time by a quartz mechanism, the analog women’s Casio wristwatch is the ideal accessory to sport when you want to add a little style to the clothes you wear on a daily basis. Body and Design Designed to accentuate the clothes and accessories you wear, the Sheen series women’s wristwatch from Casio truly makes for a very practical daily wear accessory. The designers of the timepiece have equipped the round shaped dial with lustrous rhinestone hour markers that highlight the faint hue of the dial’s background. In addition, for that added sense of sophistication and style, the wristwatch features a rhinestone studded bezel as well. To prevent the movement and mechanism of the Casio women’s analog timepiece from being affected by accidental spills and knocks, the wristwatch features a rather robust stainless steel case and bezel. Moreover, to prevent scratches from finding its way onto the dial when the watch is stored in your handbag, the designers from Casio have given it a mineral glass dial window. The Sheen series women’s analog Casio wristwatch makes use of a plush leather strap to meet all your watch-wearing comfort requirements. In addition, to make sure that the wristwatch does not slip off your wrist when you play your weekend game of tennis or badminton, the strap features a push button clasp. Functions and Other Features As a practical daily wear accessory, the women’s Sheen series analog Casio wristwatch is designed with a couple of features and functions to help you make it through your day a little easier. For example, the water-resistant timepiece features an analog day and date display along with a 24-hour dial to help you always stay up-to-date and on time for all your meetings and events that you have planned. Whichever way you look at it, the analog women’s Casio wristwatch from the Sheen series is an exemplary product from the brand and it should, in theory, make for the perfect addition to your collection of exquisite watches. top

details.name: Police To Be Eau de Toilette - 125 ml (For Men)
details.description: Police To Be Eau de Toilette - 125 ml (For Men) Price: Rs.2090 A daunting expression of rebellion and masculinity, this luxury fragrance sends palpable ripples along your skin. Proudly masculine and reflecting an urbane nature, Police To Be is for the modern man who attracts you with his inscrutability. This irresistible Eau de Toilette& adds another feather to the cap of the established house of Police. Starting off with an invigorating top note that marries fruity notes of grapefruit with freshly ground black pepper. This moves into a heart note that is dominated by the green and light notes of violet leaf that flows into the base note. An intoxicating combination of distinct white amber, warming notes of cedar and earthy patchouli make up the base note. A diverse range of ingredients give this spicy, fruity, woody fragrance its unique aroma. An inspiring scent deserves to be encased in a statement-making flacon. The glass-shaped skull bottle flaunts soft hollows with a metal plate across the mouth that spells the name of the brand. This eye-catching flacon embodies an eerie charm and a mysterious aura that is subtly appealing. Within this one-of-a-kind flacon rests the intense fragrance that shimmers in a subtle shade of azure. A spritz of this fragrance and the charismatic man who walks in solitude adds another seductive nuance to his persona.

details.name: Joop Go Eau de Toilette - 100 ml (For Men)
details.description: Joop Go Eau de Toilette - 100 ml (For Men) Price: Rs.1990 Joop weaves the essence of summer and the depth of the woods into this aromatic fragrance for the man who alternates his brooding nature with the lightness of fresh air. 2005 Prix François Coty winner and famed perfumer, Sophie Labbe proffers this elegant, luxury fragrance which leaves one reminiscing about the deep, dark woods. Fresh and green, this Eau de Toilette plays its vibrant notes on your mood. Like a mirror that reflects what is in front of it, this perfume echoes the buoyant mood of sunny days. Drawing from a fulfilling sight of a colorful garden, the top note embraces a mixture of floral and fruity with& rhubarb, pimento and bitter orange. It fades away into a beautiful heart note of cypress, violet and bourbon geranium that blend harmoniously to balance the opening slightly sour quality with a pleasing sweetness. The fragrance settles down on a base of warm, dusky musk and balsam fir leaving you yearning with tumultuous feelings.& A spritz of this effervescent fragrance dispels even tiny wisps of exhaustion and imparts invigorating vibes. This succulent scent is contained in an unadorned, transparent bottle for the best things in life do not require embellishment.

details.name: The Detox Diet (English Paperback Shonali Sabherwal Jacqueline Fernandez)
details.description: ImprintEbury PressPublication Year2017 JanuaryAuthored ByShonali SabherwalForeword ByJacqueline FernandezLanguage EnglishBinding PaperbackPublisher Penguin Random House IndiaISBN 9788184007831 8184007833Edition 1 2017Pages 272Shonali Sabherwal is a celebrity nutritionist who specializes in improving immunity removing toxins managing weight reversing eakygutsyndrome and other autoimmune ailments by first altering the biodiversity of the gut. In her new book The Detox Diet she sheds light on how the root of everything connected to our health lies in the inner ecosystem. She helps unravel the secrets of weight loss antiageing beauty and autoimmune diseases and teaches us how to reverse the health issues she believes arises when bad bacteria outdo the good ones in our system causing an imbalance. With three fantastic detox diet plans numerous recipes and an abundance of health tips this book will help you finally understand the reasons behind many of the problems for which you earlier had no answers. It will now not only get you into the best shape you have ever been in but also help you maintain and sustain a healthier lifestyle. details.name: The Complete Mahabharata 10 (English Paperback Santi Parva Anusasana Parva Anhuli Kaul Ramesh Menon)
details.description: Publication Year2017 JanuaryAuthored ByAnhuli KaulEdited ByRamesh MenonWidth6 inchesHeight9 inchesLanguage EnglishBinding PaperbackPublisher Rupa Publications IndiaISBN 9788129145130 8129145138Edition 1 2017Pages 512The Mahabharata of Veda Vyasa is the longest recorded epic in the world. With almost 100000 verses it is many times as long as the Iliad and the Odyssey combines and has deeply influenced every aspect of the Indian ethos for some 4000 years. The main theme of the epic is the Great War in Kurukshetra but it seems with smaller stories and other stories within these all woven together with a genius that defies comparison. As its heart it contains Krishnas immortal Bhagvat Gita The Song of God. The Mahabharata embodies the ancient and sacred Indian tradition in all its earthy and spiritual immensity. FamouslyWhat is found here may be found elsewhere. What is not found here will not be found elsewhere. Many believe this most magnificent epic to be the greatest story ever told. Yet the only full Indian translation of the Mahabharata into English is the one penned in the 19th century by Kisari Mohan Ganguli. More than a hundred years have passed since Ganguli accomplished his task and the laguage he used is now sadly archaic. About the Author Anjuli Kaul grew up in Bombay lives in Goa but dreams of Kodaikanal. She has been a teacher for thirty years. Her abiding love of language and literature has more recently drawn her into editing and writing. She is passionate about education organic farming sustainable living and sunsets. Ramesh Menon was born in 1951 in New Delhi. He has also written modern renderings of the Mahabharata Ramayana Srimad Bhagvad Gita Siva Purana Devi Purana and Bhagvad Purana.

details.name: Muse The (English Paperback Jessie Burton)
details.description: Publication Year2016Authored ByJessie BurtonLanguage EnglishBinding PaperbackPublisher PicadorISBN 9781447250968 1447250966Edition 2016Pages 432A picture hides a thousand words . . .On a hot July day in 1967 Odelle Bastien climbs the stone steps of the Skelton gallery in London knowing that her life is about to change forever. Having struggled to find her place in the city since she arrived from Trinidad five years ago she has been offered a job as a typist under the tutelage of the glamorous and enigmatic Marjorie Quick. But though Quick takes Odelle into her confidence and unlocks a potential she didnt know she had she remains a mystery no more so than when a lost masterpiece with a secret history is delivered to the gallery.The truth about the painting lies in 1936 and a large house in rural Spain where Olive Schloss the daughter of a renowned art dealer is harbouring ambitions of her own. Into this fragile paradise come artist and revolutionary Isaac Robles and his halfsister Teresa who immediately insinuate themselves into the Schloss family with explosive and devastating consequences . . .Seductive exhilarating and suspenseful The Muse is an unforgettable novel about aspiration and identity love and obsession authenticity and deception a masterpiece from the millioncopy bestselling author of The Miniaturist. About the Author Jessie Burton was born in 1982 and lives in London. She studied at Oxford University and The Royal Central School of Speech and Drama and worked for nine years as an actress and a PA before her first novel The Miniaturist was published. The Miniaturist was translated into over thirty languages and has sold over a million copies around the world.
